title: What Are Wall Street Analysts' Target Price for Micron Technology Stock?
full_text: What Are Wall Street Analysts' Target Price for Micron Technology Stock?. As Micron Technology has significantly outperformed the broader market over the past year, Wall Street analysts maintain a highly optimistic outlook about.... Valued at a market cap of $461.7 billion, Micron Technology, Inc. (MU) designs, develops, manufactures, and sells memory and storage products.
